headline: PNC taps new president, sees 'opportunity to scale'
summary: BlackRock veteran Mark Wiedman is taking the torch as president at PNC. The seeming successor to longtime CEO Bill Demchak will be tasked with helping the bank evolve.

headline: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc (PNC) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Improve Your Retirement Income with These 3 Top-Ranked Dividend Stocks
summary: The traditional retirement planning approaches no longer cover all expenses in nest egg years. So what can retirees do? Thankfully, there are alternative investments that provide steady, higher-rate income streams to replace dwindling bond yields.

headline: PNC Hires Mark Wiedman, Former Top BlackRock Executive, as President
summary: Wiedman will report to CEO and chairman Bill Demchak, effective immediately. Pittsburgh-based PNC is the seventh-largest U.S. bank by assets.
